text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump No we do not. I wish it were not so, but that is the truth. We have very LITTLE testing to date & no mass program. This is on Trump. He's bungled the #COVID19 response like no other. 

Remember who's telling these #Lies. A former @FoxNews talking head. #FoxNewsLiedAsPeopleDied
